MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL13  postcode area of Wrexham affecting properties in St. Georges Crescent and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:55pm on the 20th April 2021.
